command: tag @p add self_a
clear @p arx:pires_gift 0 1
tag @p[tag=self_a, tag=!solve_crystal] add self
tag @p[tag=self_a, tag=solve_crystal] add contrself
tag @p[tag=self, scores={case_counter_pr=0..150}] add case_pires_score_logged
scoreboard players set @p[tag=self, tag=!case_pires_score_logged] case_counter_pr 0
tag @p remove case_pires_score_logged
scoreboard players add @p[tag=self] case_counter_pr 1
scoreboard players set @p[tag=self, scores={case_counter_pr=151}] case_counter_pr 1
title @p[tag=self, scores={case_counter_pr=9}] actionbar §bСледующая молитва Пиреса - простой гарант
